none.description:
{Magic Cushion}

School: Earth, Water.
Proficiency: None.

{green|Bless}:
Mass Anti-Magic spell at the beginning of every battle.

{red|Curse}:
-10% Power,
-10% Knowledge,
-100 maximum movement points,
 -5% experience gain.

{#6d38ff|Ingredients} costs:
-200 gold,
-1 Crystal,
-1 Gems.

{#38e8ff|Duration}:
All the effects remain until next week.
